title: Ice Cube Sits In On News, Reacts To Ramsey Suspension & More
itunes:title: Ice Cube Sits In On News, Reacts To Ramsey Suspension & More
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler & Chris Wesseling - welcome the biggest star they’ve ever had on the podcast, rapper/actor/producer and founder of the Big 3 basketball league, Ice Cube. As the heroes recap the latest news from around the league, Ice Cube sits in and reacts to the Jaguars suspending Jalen Ramsey and Dante Fowler for ‘unbecoming conduct’ (6:30), Dolphins QB Ryan Tannehill kicking a rookie teammate out of the huddle (10:30) and Hue Jackson’s unique punishment for WR Antonio Callaway (13:30). The heroes review Friday’s preseason games, including a unique perspective of the Raiders from the team’s most famous fan (15:00) and a way-too-early entry for the radio call of the year by Cardinals broadcaster Ron Wolfley (38:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
